titles.title: Price Stability Act of 2023
Price Stability Act of 2023
To amend the Federal Reserve Act to remove the mandate on the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal Open Market Committee to focus on maximum employment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Price Stability Act of 2023
This bill removes maximum employment as a goal of the monetary policy set by the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal Open Market Committee.
